sentences.sentence: Five people are reported dead and 27 injured after a rocket hit a multi-storey building in Dnipro in Ukraine during a massive air attack by Russian forces on Saturday.

sentences.sentence: It comes amid claims from the leader of Russian paramilitary group Wagner that they are in full control of the Donbass town of Soledar.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: in its latest show of support for Kyiv.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: British media has reported that four main battle tanks will be sent to Eastern Europe immediately, with eight more to follow shortly after. Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky took to Twitter in response, thanking the, quote, strong support from the UK. So far, the Czech Republic and Poland have provided Soviet-era tanks to Ukraine. Warsaw is also looking at sending German-made Leopard tanks to the country.

Iran accused Alireza Akbari of being, quote, one of the most important agents of the British intelligence service in Iran the sentence was met by international condemnation with the British Foreign Secretary decrying the quote barbaric act on Twitter the execution comes amid accusations from Iran that foreign powers are influencing widespread anti-government protests in the country spread anti-government protests in the country. Authorities have arrested the former Justice Minister of Brazil, Anderson Torres, who served

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: under previous President Jair Bolsonaro.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Torres faces accusations of colluding with thousands of Bolsonaro fans, who ransacked Congress and the Supreme Court in a violent rejection of new president, Luiz In√°cio Lula da Silva.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Brazil's new justice minister, Flavio Dino, also confirmed the existence of a draft document found at Torres' home, proposing steps for a possible, quote, correction of the presidential election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In response, Torres has denied the claims against him, saying that the draft document was likely destined to be destroyed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Former populist Prime Minister Andrzej Babis and ex-general Petro Pavel will face each other in the second and final round of the Czech presidential election in two weeks' time, with 99.99% of all ballots counted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The first round was very close, with less than a percentage point between the two front runners.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Earlier this week, Babis was given an electoral boost after he was acquitted in a fraud trial.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Nevertheless, it wasn't big enough to win in the first round.
